titleStmt.title: A brief treatise vpon the first table of the lavve, orderly disposing the principles of religion, whereby we may examine ourselues. / Written by Maister Dudley Fenner, minister of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Fenner, Dudley, 1558?-1587.

titleStmt.title: A brief treatise vpon the first table of the lavve, orderly disposing the principles of religion, whereby we may examine ourselues. / Written by Maister Dudley Fenner, minister of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Fenner, Dudley, 1558?-1587.

notesStmt.note: Part 2, "The groundes of religion necessarie to be knovven of euery one that may be admitted to the Supper of the Lord" has a separate dated title page.
Part 2 formerly STC 10773; identified as STC 10773 on reel 1096:15.
Imperfect: part 2 only at reel 1096:15; cropped, with loss of text.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (reel 1096:15) and Folger Shakespeare Library (reel 2115:7).
